page.title: 12MILK MARKETING BOARD
page.content: THE{MILK MARKETING BOARD}HAS AN {ARTICIAL INSEMINATION CENTRE}AND A {BULL REARING UNIT}AT{KINGTON ST. {MICHAEL.THE BULL REARING UNIT}IS THE {ONLY ONE}OF ITS KIND IN THE{COUNTRY AND HAS BEEN THERE FOR 40 YEARS. THE BULLS ARE{FRESIAN AND HOLSTEIN}WITH THE ODD BELGIAN BLUE OR CHAROLAIS.THE BULLS STAY AT THE CENTRE FROM THE AGE OF{10 WEEKS UNTIL 14}MONTHS.THEY ARE THEN SENT TO{A.I CENTRES}AROUND THE COUNTRY.A{COMPUTER AT THAMES DITTON}IS USED TO MONITOR THE DAUGHTERS OF THESE BULLS,AND ONLY THE{BEST BULLS}ARE ALLOWED TO CONTINUE{DONATING SPERM. THE{M.M.B.}IS THEREFORE INSURING THAT THE BEST BULLS MATE THE BEST COWS ,GRADUALLY{IMPROVING THE NATION'S {STOCK. (continued on next page)
